title: DIC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 05 Full Stack Developer, Testing Lead and Other Posts
description: The Digital India Corporation (DIC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Full Stack Developers, a DevOps Engineer, a QA/ Testing Lead, and a UI/ UX Designer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Computer Science Engineering can apply for the DIC Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in onl...
